description:
Horror games and October. They just fit so nicely together, don't they? Last year, I built out a calendar of all the horror games launching in October, and people seemed to really enjoy it. Since it was useful to our readers and a blast to write, I'm back at it for another year. If you've read my work on GameSpot, you may already know I'm a horror obsessive. If you're like me, this calendar of new horror games should fill up your schedule since you've probably already done well to play the best horror games to play in 2025. Perhaps some of these will end up on that list soon enough.

One difference between last year's list and this year's
title: Here Are All The New Horror Games You Can Play For Halloween Season

description:
We're getting a blast from the past when a future major Call of Duty: Warzone update drops in Spring 2026. "A bold new experience" will come to the battle royale, inspired by the Black Ops 4 battle royale mode, Blackout.

"Call of Duty: Warzone is bringing a bold new experience in Spring of 2026 inspired by the original Blackout, set on Avalon," reads a post from the official Call of Duty X account.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 4 was the first Call of Duty game to feature a battle royale mode. Launching after the battle royale boom in 2017, Blackout had 100 players drop onto a gigantic map to fight for their lives until only one player or team was left standing.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Call Of Duty: Warzone Is Returning To Its Blackout Roots

description:
A South Dakota teenager has pleaded guilty to sending messages to developers at Fortnite studio Epic Games threatening to kill them.

Jayden Griffin, 19, pleaded guilty to "threatening interstate commerce." He faces a sentence of up to five years in federal prison, a $250,000 fine, or both, and a period of supervised release of up to three years.

Court documents seen by GameSpot show that a US Grand Jury charged Griffin in December 2024 over claims that he sent threatening messages to people at Epic Games by way of electronic communications sent between October 24, 2024 and November 9, 2024. The Grand Jury cited a violation of 18 U.S.C. § 875(c). It constituted interstate commerce because Epic Games is located in North Carolina, and that's where the messages were sent.
title: Teen Who Threatened To Kill Devs At Fortnite Studio Pleads Guilty

description:
No one likes waiting, especially when there's nothing to do to pass the time. Peak developer Landfall Games had that same thought when working on Peak's most recent DillyDally update. It adds a handful of activities to lobbies while waiting for other players to join, including a basketball hoop, photo booth, and chess pieces.

Players went straight to work with the chess pieces, but not according to official rules the classic game uses.

We got bored
by u/Imanthony89 in PeakGame
</
title: Peak Players Are Passing Time At The Airport In Increasingly Elaborate Ways

description:
As part of the Call of Duty: Next event today, Activision made a series of major announcements about the FPS franchise, including what's next for Call of Duty: Warzone.

To begin with, Activision said Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's integration into Warzone will begin in Season 1, and this will include a brand-new Resurgence map called Haven's Hollow. This is a smaller map than Fortune's Keep but larger than Rebirth Island.
title: Call Of Duty: Warzone Adding New Resurgence Map, But Verdansk Isn't Going Anywhere

description: <
title: Official Final Fantasy Tactics Apparel Is Available At Amazon
8BitDo Ultimate 2 Controllers Are Discounted Ahead Of Prime Big Deal Days

description:
EA is preparing to go private, as the veteran video game company will be sold for an eye-watering sum of $55 billion to an investor consortium made up of Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund, Jared Kushner's Affinity Partners, and the private equity firm Silver Lake. While this deal will require regulator approval and a sign-off by stockholders, EA is expecting the deal to be completed in Q1 FY27.

A privately owned EA could be a very different company when compared to its public incarnation, and it will also have to work off $20 billion of new debt that is being used to finance the buyout. So what does $55 billion buy you these days? Quite a lot, as EA's potential new owners will be acquiring studios,
title: What $55 Billion Buys: Everything Included In The EA Acquisition

description:
As part of Call of Duty: Next today, Activision and Treyarch hyped Black Ops 7's post-launch support, which begins with Season 1. It will be the "biggest in franchise history" as it relates to a Season 1 for a new Call of Duty game, the developer said.

Specifically, there will be seven more 6v6 maps added to Black Ops 7 multiplayer in Season 1, along with two new Zombies Survival maps, and one new round-based Zombies map. There could also be new Call of Duty: Warzone content as well.

Activision historically releases Call of Duty's seasonal content over time and not all at once, often divided between content available at launch and then down the road in a Reloaded update.
title: Black Ops 7 Season 1 Is Biggest First Season In Franchise History

description:
Hamilton has released a new special edition of its popular Khaki Field watch in partnership with Call of Duty. Timed with Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's launch on November 14, this edition is limited to 5,000 pieces. The watch looks almost identical to the standard Khaki Field model, with the only game-related detail being a special caseback.

It also appears in the game itself, worn by the mysterious Axel Vermaak, and is the third collaboration between Hamilton and video games. The others being Far Cry 6 and Death Stranding 2.

"With our partnership with Call of Duty, we're expanding that narrative into a new frontier: interactive storytelling. Gaming is now one of the most immersive mediums, and
title: Here's What A $1,000 Call Of Duty Watch Looks Like

description:
At the end of this week, players will finally get a chance to explore Sucker Punch's much-anticipated follow-up to Ghost of Tsushima, Ghost of Yotei. But judging from the massive size of Ghost of Yotei's day-one patch, you may want to make sure you're up to date before searching the areas around Mount Yotei.

Sony has confirmed that the Version 1.006 patch will give Ghost of Yotei several important fixes, including ray tracing and performance improvements, as well as animation, gameplay, and environmental adjustments. There are a lot of bugs mentioned in the patch notes, and the update also addresses crash fixes and new photo mode additions.

This patch is primarily for players who purchased Ghost of Yotei on disc. Pl
title: Ghost Of Yotei's Day-One Patch Has A Whole Bunch Of Fixes

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's November 14 launch is around the corner, and the fan-favorite map Nuketown is reported to make a return sometime after the game's launch on PC, PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S.

CharlieIntel confirmed in an Twitter post on September 30 that Nuketown will arrive in Black Ops 7 "before Season 1." While this means it isn't one of the game's 18 multiplayer maps, Black Ops 6's first season kicked off on November 14, 2024--just 20 days after its October 25, 2024 launch. If Black Ops 7's first season follows a similar trajectory, Nuketown could drop in early December.

Nuketown was f
title: Black Ops 7 Brings Back Iconic Nuketown Map, And Here's When

description:
Saudi Arabia's government continues to grow its gaming and esports portfolio


The pending $55 billion acquisition of game-publishing giant EA by a consortium of investors, most notably Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF), sent shockwaves through the industry. It is the second-biggest acquisition in the history of the games industry, and it is only the Saudi Arabian government's latest move in the video gaming space.

Over the past several years, the PIF and its subsidiary Savvy Games Group have invested in or acquired gaming companies from different parts of the world, holding stakes in some of the leading publishers in the industry. The Saudi Arabian government has long been
title: All The Gaming Companies Saudi Arabia Owns Or Has Invested In

description:
Battlefield 6's first season will begin on October 28, EA and Battlefield Studios have announced. The developer also disclosed some of what's coming to the game, including new maps and guns.

Season 1 will play out in three phases, including Rogue Ops, California Resistance, and Winter Offensive. Each phase adds a new map and other items, including weapons. Here's a rundown:

October 28: Rogue Ops

This first phase adds the Blackwell Fields map, along with a new mode called Strikepoint and a new vehicle called Traverser Mark 2. It also adds new guns, including the SOR-300SC carbine, the GGH-22 sidearm, the Mini Scout sniper rifle, and the Rail Cover and LPVO attachments.
title: Battlefield 6 Season 1 Release Date And Free Content Revealed

description:
While Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 launches on November 14, you can get a taste of the military shooter's multiplayer action on PC, PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S in early October. And now, we know exactly when, as the Call of Duty blog revealed both the game's early access and open beta unlock times.

Black Ops 7's early access beta period runs from Thursday, October 2, to Sunday, October 5, at 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET. This window is for folks who preorder the game, subscribe to Game Pass Ultimate, get a code via Xfinity, or
title: Here Are Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7's Early Access And Open Beta Unlock Times

description:
It appears that Sony is working on an updated PlayStation 5 controller with a removable battery pack, similar to those available for Xbox controllers, according to a new report by the German gaming outlet PPE.pl.

As spotted by VGC, PPE.pl is reporting that this PS5 controller--reportedly known internally as the DualSense V3--is slated to arrive this November with a removable battery pack. Specifics were sparse, but according to PPE.pl's source--someone named Graczdari, who correctly predicted Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024's PS5 reveal and uncovered the boxed version of
title: PS5 DualSense Controller With Removable Battery Reportedly On The Way

description:
Sony has shared launch times for when Ghost of Yotei will go live for players, with the PS5 exclusive's official release date set for October 2. The game is a follow-up to Ghost of Tsushima, though this title has a standalone story.

Ghost of Yotei will unlock at basically midnight local time October 2 in each player's country. This means that parts of the US can begin Atsu's tale of revenge late tomorrow, October 1. For instance, people on the West Coast will see Ghost of Yotei unlock at 9 PM PT tomorrow, which equates to 12 AM ET October 2 for residents of the East Coast.

Ghost of Yotei focuses on Atsu, who is a sellsword instead of a samurai like Jin in Ghost of Tsushima. The upcoming open-world game takes place in Feudal Japan and sees Atsu seeking revenge after a gang of outlaws killed her family.

Continue Reading at G
title: Ghost Of Yotei Release Times Revealed

description:
Only a few more months remain before we call it a year on 2025, and like previous years, the Q4 gaming calendar is packed with new releases for PC and console. Kicking things off early this month is Ghost of Yotei, a slice of samurai action that you'll only find on PS5 consoles--for now--while Microsoft's big releases include Keeper and The Outer Worlds 2. Not to be outdone, Nintendo is dropping Pokemon Legends: Z-A and is releasing its Super Mario Galaxy games from purgatory.

Sandwiched between all of these releases are several other highly anticipated titles, like Arc Raiders, the long-in-development Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, and--most importantly--Just Dance 2026 Edition. The year just wouldn't feel right without a Ubisoft game encouraging you to get off your couch and move to the groove of chart-topping hits that will make you feel o
title: The Biggest Game Releases Of October 2025

description:
The latest Nintendo Switch 2 firmware update has arrived, but do not expect much in the way of significant changes. Version 20.5.0 launched on September 29 and is focused on stability.

The one-line patch notes state: "General system stability improvements to enhance the user's experience."

Social media user OatmealDome, who is known to pore over the files and discover additional details not mentioned in the patch notes, said there is "no info" on what might be hidden in this new update, if anything. However, OatmealDome said the patch "might have some backwards compatibility fixes."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: New Switch 2 Update Out Now, Doesn't Do Much

description:
The Super Mario Galaxy games are widely considered to be among the crown jewels of 3D Mario platforming. Fans may differ on which Galaxy game is better or if Odyssey is the new apex of the form, but the fact that they're even in the conversation makes them some of the best Nintendo games of the last two decades. That makes it all the more strange that it has consistently been so difficult to play them. You could play on Wii or Wii U, but otherwise the only way to play Galaxy on modern hardware was with the Super Mario 3D All-Stars collection, a bizarrely time-limited collection that was still missing Galaxy 2. So the remastered Galaxy and Galaxy 2 on Switch and Switch 2 is a treat simply for making these great games available and easy to access--but a handful of improvements make them better than ever.

If you already own the All-Stars release, the remastered version of Galaxy is largely the same, but the new remaster-package version does look noticeably be
title: Super Mario Galaxy And Galaxy 2 Are Still Peak 3D Platforming

description:
Call of Duty: Next, Activision's annual Call of Duty reveal event, is coming today, September 30, promising news and updates on Black Ops 7's multiplayer, Zombies, and campaign. We're also expecting updates on what's next for the battle royale game Call of Duty: Warzone.

It's a major event for one of the biggest FPS franchises out there, and it'll be streamed live for everyone to watch. Tuning in has a special bonus this year, as Activision is giving out Black Ops 7 early-access beta codes to people who watch for a set period of time.

Below is a rundown of everything we know so far about Call of Duty: Next and how to watch.
title: How To Watch Call Of Duty: Next Today And Get A Free Beta Code, Plus What To Expect

description:
Microsoft is gearing up to make some kind of Halo announcement. The developer, Halo Studios, has reaffirmed plans first announced in June to reveal "what we've been working on" during the upcoming Halo World Championships event this October.

In a new blog post, Halo Studios said the team will appear on the main state to "talk about it." There will also be a "deep dive" panel lined up that Halo Studios says "you won't want to miss."

These events both take place on Friday, October 24. That's all Microsoft had to say--the company did not even specify if it plans to talk about new games or if the announcement could be something else.

Continue Reading at
title: News On Halo's Future Is Coming Very Soon

description:
Nearly three years ago, Ken Levine shared the first look at Judas, his long-awaited follow-up to BioShock Infinite. Players have noticed some obvious visual similarities between Judas and the BioShock games, but according to Levine, it represents "the biggest radical departure" for him since the original BioShock.

"There are parts of Judas that are more similar to BioShock, and there are parts of Judas that are really really radically different," explained Levine during an appearance on MrMattyPlays' YouTube show. "I'm sure people notice there's a gun in one hand [and] powers [in] the other hand. We have an additional
title: Judas Is Ken Levine's "Biggest Radical Departure" Since BioShock, He Says
A Nightmare On Elm Street 7-Film 4K Blu-Ray Collection Is Available Now
